p: miR-129-5p has been reported in the increase in the size of A375 cells through binding to AEG1 [ 83]. In other types of cancer, this miR is related to cell cycle control, proliferation, migration, and invasion [ 84] in multiple myeloma, glioma cells [ 85, 86], prostate cancer [ 87, 88], colorectal cancer [ 89], and breast cancer [ 90].
